sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import CheckoutSteps from '../components/paymentStep'
import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'
import { useEffect } from 'react'
import { add } from '../actions/paymentAction'
import { Card, ListGroup, Button, Col, Row, Image } from 'react-bootstrap'
import { Link, useNavigate, useParams } from 'react-router-dom'

function PaymentDescriptionProduct() {
  const params = useParams()
  const { id: productId } = params
  const navigate = useNavigate()

  const dispatch = useDispatch()
  useEffect(() => {
    if (productId) {
      dispatch(add(productId))
    }
  }, [dispatch, productId])

  const payment = useSelector((state) => state.payment)
  //const { Items } = payment

  const checkoutHandler = () => {
    navigate('/')
  }
  return (
    <>
      <CheckoutSteps step1></CheckoutSteps>
      <Row>
        <ListGroup variant="flush">
          <ListGroup.Item key={payment.project}>
            <Row>
              <Col md={1}>
                <Image
                  src={payment.image}
                  rounded
                  fluid
                  alt={payment.name}
                ></Image>
              </Col>
              <Col>
                <Link to={`/product/${payment.project}`}>{payment.name}</Link>
              </Col>
              <Col md={1}>${payment.category}</Col>
              <Col md={1}>${payment.category}</Col>
            </Row>
          </ListGroup.Item>
        </ListGroup>
        <Col md={4}>
          <Card>
            <ListGroup variant="flush">
              <ListGroup.Item>
                <Button
                  type="button"
                  onClick={checkoutHandler}
                  className="btn-block"
                >
                  Proceed to Checkout
                </Button>
              </ListGroup.Item>
            </ListGroup>
          </Card>
        </Col>
      </Row>
    </>
  )
}

export default PaymentDescriptionProduct
